duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager to achieve retail store targets by driving sales
Opening and closing the store, ensuring the store trades safely and legally in the absence of any other management
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service
Assisting with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions
Assisting customers with their queries and demonstrating products
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to our customers
